name: Fun Analysis of NYC Citibike Dataset

0.content:
# NYC Citibike 2013 Ride Analysis

This dashboard offers an interactive exploration of the iconic New York City Citibike dataset. Discover when people ride, which stations are most popular, how long trips last, and who the riders are. Use the charts and tables to uncover interesting patterns and stories behind the rides.
0.name: Introduction

1.content:
select  
    start_time.date,
    count(start_time) as total_rides,  
    (sum(duration) / count(duration)) / 60 as avg_trip_duration_minutes  
order by  
    start_time.date asc
limit 100;
1.name: Monthly Rides & Average Duration

2.content:
select  
    round(duration/60, 0) as duration_bucket,  
    count(start_time) as trip_count  
having trip_count>10
and duration_bucket <120
order by  
    duration_bucket asc
2.name: Trip Duration Distribution

3.content:
select
    start_station.id,
    start_station.name,
    count(start_time) as total_rides,
    start_station.capacity
order by
    total_rides desc
limit 10;
3.name: Top Start Stations

4.content:
select  
    end_station.id,  
    end_station.name,  
    count(start_time) as total_rides,
    end_station.capacity as capacity
order by  
    total_rides desc  
limit 10;
4.name: Top End Stations

5.content:
select  
    start_station.id,  
    start_station.longitude,  
    start_station.latitude,  
    count(start_time) as tripss
where start_station.longitude != 0
limit 1000;
5.name: Station Ride Counts

6.content:
select
    user_type,
    rider.gender,
    count(start_time) as total_rides
order by
    user_type asc,
    rider.gender asc
limit 100;
6.name: User Type and Gender Breakdown

7.content:
select
    start_time.day_of_week,
    start_time.hour,
    count(start_time) as total_ride_count
order by
    start_time.day_of_week asc,
    start_time.hour asc
7.name: Ride Counts by Day of Week and Hour

description: Explore the classic New York Citibike dataset with engaging visualizations that reveal usage trends, popular stations, rider demographics, and temporal patterns. Use this dashboard to dive into the story behind the rides across NYC.
